20101202153808.000|20101202153808.000|XDS|%    TITLE:   
20101202153808.000|20101202153808.000|CC1|      WHILE A BODY IN MOTION    
20101202153808.000|20101202153811.000|CC1|     TENDS TO STAY IN MOTION.   
20101202153809.000|20101202153809.000|XDS|%    TITLE: PFCX0003000H
20101202153811.000|20101202153811.000|CC1|   STAYING ACTIVE CAN ACTUALLY  
20101202153811.000|20101202153814.000|CC1|     EASE ARTHRITIS SYMPTOMS.   
20101202153814.000|20101202153815.000|CC1|    BUT IF YOU HAVE ARTHRITIS,  
20101202153815.000|20101202153815.000|CC1|          STAYING ACTIVE        
20101202153815.000|20101202153817.000|CC1|        CAN BE DIFFICULT.       
20101202153817.000|20101202153817.000|CC1|      PRESCRIPTION CELEBREX     
20101202153817.000|20101202153820.000|CC1| CAN HELP RELIEVE ARTHRITIS PAIN
20101202153820.000|20101202153820.000|CC1|           SO YOUR BODY         
20101202153820.000|20101202153823.000|CC1|       CAN STAY IN MOTION.      
20101202153823.000|20101202153823.000|CC1|         BECAUSE JUST ONE       
20101202153823.000|20101202153825.000|CC1|       200MG CELEBREX A DAY     
20101202153825.000|20101202153827.000|CC1|    CAN PROVIDE 24 HOUR RELIEF  
20101202153827.000|20101202153827.000|CC1|   FOR MANY WITH ARTHRITIS PAIN 
20101202153827.000|20101202153830.000|CC1|        AND INFLAMMATION.       
20101202153830.000|20101202153831.000|CC1|    PLUS, IN CLINICAL STUDIES,  
20101202153831.000|20101202153831.000|CC1|  CELEBREX IS PROVEN TO IMPROVE 
20101202153831.000|20101202153834.000|CC1|     DAILY PHYSICAL FUNCTION    
20101202153834.000|20101202153836.000|CC1|       SO MOVING IS EASIER.     
20101202153836.000|20101202153838.000|CC1| AND CELEBREX IS NOT A NARCOTIC.
20101202153838.000|20101202153838.000|CC1|    WHEN IT COMES TO RELIEVING  
20101202153838.000|20101202153840.000|CC1|       YOUR ARTHRITIS PAIN,     
20101202153840.000|20101202153840.000|CC1|       YOU AND YOUR DOCTOR      
20101202153840.000|20101202153841.000|CC1|   NEED TO BALANCE THE BENEFITS 
20101202153841.000|20101202153843.000|CC1|         WITH THE RISKS.        
20101202153843.000|20101202153843.000|CC1|     ALL PRESCRIPTION NSAIDS,   
20101202153843.000|20101202153845.000|CC1|       INCLUDING CELEBREX,      
20101202153845.000|20101202153845.000|CC1|     MAY INCREASE THE CHANCE    
20101202153845.000|20101202153847.000|CC1|    OF HEART ATTACK OR STROKE,  
20101202153847.000|20101202153848.000|CC1|     WHICH CAN LEAD TO DEATH.   
20101202153848.000|20101202153848.000|CC1|      THIS CHANCE INCREASES     
20101202153848.000|20101202153850.000|CC1|    IF YOU HAVE HEART DISEASE   
20101202153850.000|20101202153850.000|CC1|         OR RISK FACTORS        
20101202153850.000|20101202153852.000|CC1|   SUCH AS HIGH BLOOD PRESSURE  
20101202153852.000|20101202153852.000|CC1|     OR WHEN NSAIDS ARE TAKEN   
20101202153852.000|20101202153855.000|CC1|        FOR LONG PERIODS.       
20101202153855.000|20101202153856.000|CC1|   NSAIDS, INCLUDING CELEBREX,  
20101202153856.000|20101202153856.000|CC1|  INCREASE THE CHANCE OF SERIOUS
20101202153856.000|20101202153859.000|CC1|    SKIN OR ALLERGIC REACTIONS  
20101202153859.000|20101202153859.000|CC1|     OR STOMACH AND INTESTINE   
20101202153859.000|20101202153901.000|CC1|            PROBLEMS,           
20101202153901.000|20101202153902.000|CC1|   SUCH AS BLEEDING AND ULCERS, 
20101202153902.000|20101202153902.000|CC1| WHICH CAN OCCUR WITHOUT WARNING
20101202153902.000|20101202153905.000|CC1|       AND MAY CAUSE DEATH.     
20101202153905.000|20101202153905.000|CC1|   PATIENTS ALSO TAKING ASPIRIN 
20101202153905.000|20101202153907.000|CC1|         AND THE ELDERLY        
20101202153907.000|20101202153907.000|CC1|    ARE AT INCREASED RISK FOR   
20101202153907.000|20101202153910.000|CC1|   STOMACH BLEEDING AND ULCERS. 
20101202153910.000|20101202153910.000|CC1|  DO NOT TAKE CELEBREX IF YOU'VE
20101202153910.000|20101202153912.000|CC1|   HAD AN ASTHMA ATTACK, HIVES, 
20101202153912.000|20101202153912.000|CC1|  OR OTHER ALLERGIES TO ASPIRIN,
20101202153912.000|20101202153915.000|CC1|     NSAIDS OR SULFONAMIDES.    
20101202153915.000|20101202153915.000|CC1| GET HELP RIGHT AWAY IF YOU HAVE
20101202153915.000|20101202153918.000|CC1| SWELLING OF THE FACE OR THROAT,
20101202153918.000|20101202153919.000|CC1|      OR TROUBLE BREATHING.
